title: 1 Corinthians 12:12-27
description: Scripture reference used in FCT Module 4

content.contextInModule: The Body of Christ (1 Corinthians 12:12-27) \- Paul's description of the church as a body with many parts working together illustrates the importance of collaborative and supportive efforts, including the development of technology that fosters community and unity.
